content: as the nights draw in and we start planning our garden for the spring deciding what to grow for the next year… these easy to make cute little seedling pots can make spring seem so much closer fairly simple to make with very clear instructions on how to complete each step a much loved addition to my garden collection suitable for advanced beginner/intermediate level 4 page written pattern this pattern is my original pattern by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms of use please do not claim this pattern as your own you may not sell or distribute the pattern or any part thereof without prior permission it is for personal use only it is permitted to make items from this pattern to sell for charitable purposes provided they meet safety guidelines and crochet at teri s is accredited
